boardgame.name: Tinners_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Trail
青瓷天下
boardgame.description: Tinners' Trail is set in nineteenth century Cornwall. You are mining for copper and tin, attempting to sell when the prices are high. To reduce the cost of mining you can place developments, such as ports, adits, and trains. Once you have made your money you invest it in industries outside of Cornwall, which gains you victory points. The earlier you invest the better the return._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Official web page_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Awards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 2011 Ludoteca Ideale (Italy)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

QWG Games - Tinner_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Trail Language: Dutch Players: 3 to 4 Age: 13+ Duration: 60 to 90 min Weight: 1.110 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Tinners_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Trail is set in nineteenth century Cornwall. You are mining for copper and tin, attempting to sell when the prices are high. To reduce the cost of mining you can place developments, such as ports, adits, and trains. Once you have made your money you invest it in industries outside of Cornwall, which gains you victory points. The earlier you invest the better the return. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.

This item is tracked and insured to the value of £20. If additional insurance is required please contact me to arrange (Buyer pays additional cost). I aim to dispatch all items within 72hrs of receiving payment and delivery normally takes 3-5 working days. If multiple items are bought I will combine shipping, please contact me to arrange this. I recycle packaging wherever possible to keep shipping costs as low as I am able. --Collection-- Your item can be collected from my store in Berkshire (RG45 7AD). Please contact info@thegameshunter.co.uk to arrange. Selecting this option will avoid any shipping costs. I also attend games nights in Reading and Wokingham and can bring these with me. Again this avoids shipping costs, contact me to arrange. --Returns-- If you are unhappy with the product, please contact info@thegameshunter.co.uk within 7 working days and we will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the Buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. --Multiple Purchase Discounts-- I am happy to offer discounts if multiple marketplace purchases are made. QWG Games - Tinner_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Trail Language: Dutch Players: 3 to 4 Age: 13+ Duration: 60 to 90 min Weight: 1.110 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: Tinners_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Trail is set in nineteenth century Cornwall. You are mining for copper and tin, attempting to sell when the prices are high. To reduce the cost of mining you can place developments, such as ports, adits, and trains. Once you have made your money you invest it in industries outside of Cornwall, which gains you victory points. The earlier you invest the better the return. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
